fixed_skill.desc: Restore party's HP by 12.9/13.5/14.2% of Attack + 390/483/582. Cure 1 elemental ailment.
fixed_skill.name: Elemental Restoration

innate_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to 1 foe equal to 114.0/119.7/125.4% of Attack. 63.3/66.5/69.6% chance to inflict Freeze for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Bufula

innate_skill.desc: At the start of battle, increase party's Defense by 9.1% for 2 turns or until user changes Personas.
innate_skill.name: Auto-Maraku II

passive_skill.desc: Increase max HP by 14.1%. After healing, increase target's max HP by 10.6% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Discretion of Life

passive_skill.desc: Increase max HP by 14.1%. After healing, increase target's max HP by 12% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Discretion of Life I

passive_skill.desc: Increase max HP by 14.1%. After healing, increase target's max HP by 13.4% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Discretion of Life II

showtime_skill.desc: Restore HP to party equal to 48.6%/52.0%/55.4% Attack + 1471/1854/2275.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
